price: آيا هغوى يو بل ته په دې خبره سپارښتنه کړې وه؟ بلكې هغوى سركښ خلک وو.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
